results.title: Use of Metformin in Patients with Kidney and Cardiovascular Diseases.
results.text_hl: There is evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use interrupts mitochondrial oxidative stress in the liver and corrects @<m>DISEASE_Mycobacterium_avium_intracellulare_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015270 @@@abnormalities of intracellular@@@ @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ metabolism in @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-sensitive tissues (liver, skeletal muscle, and adipocytes) and cardiovascular tissue.

citations.NLM: Klachko D, Whaley-Connell A. Use of Metformin in Patients with Kidney and Cardiovascular Diseases. Cardiorenal Med. 2011;1(2):87-95. PMID: 22294985
